page.title: 14The Priory Now Cont
page.content: Inside the southern edge of the perimiter fence there is a small hut. The priory is very isolated except for the farmhouse which was not built until later. The kitchen is next to the small hut. The walls for the priory are made strong with big stones on the outside and smaller stones on the inside. There is a grinding stone inthe priory. The fence was given by the Ministry of Works. The priory's stones are smooth the the pillar is well shaped and carved. There is a small trough in which water would have been stored. The surrounding land is owned by the Laws. The farmhouse belongs to the Laws and has recently been lived in but is now derelict.
